episodes.title: Episode 6: Interview with an ex of a 764 member: The Kyle Spitze Story
episodes.description: Inside 764 Episode 6 tells the true story of Chloe, a survivor who unknowingly dated a member of the 764 online cult - and later helped bring about his arrest. After discovering her ex-boyfriend was exploiting minors through encrypted platforms linked to 764, Chloe tried to report him to local authorities and was ignored. As the scale of the abuse became clear, she took her evidence directly to the FBI, triggering an investigation that led to his arrest in February 2024. This episode is part of an investigative journalism series examining online grooming, digital exploitation, and the systems struggling to keep children safe. Listener discretion is advised.

episodes.title: Cadenheads encounter with the police before becoming a cult leader of 764

The disturbing world of 764 live streams
Episode 5: FBI Informant Exposed: How a Neo-Nazi Cult Leader Helped Build 764
episodes.description:
*This episode is an investigation into a major public safety issue*

Episode 5 of Inside 764 pulls back the curtain on the chain of events that ignited one of the most disturbing youth extremist movements of the digital age. What begins with a Hindu cult in rural North Carolina spirals into a web of neo-Nazi ideology, forbidden texts, and a paid FBI informant whose work would shape 764’s foundations.

We follow the story of a survivor who unknowingly befriended the man at the centre of it all, only to discover his ties to O9A, Temple Ov Blood, Martinet Press and Atomwaffen Division. Experts reveal how his writings and doctrines spread across the internet, seeping into the minds of teenagers — even as the FBI quietly paid him more than $140k while he produced material later echoed inside 764.

This episode exposes the hidden machinery behind the cult’s rise and asks a haunting question: what happens when the government’s own informant becomes one of the most powerful accelerants of modern extremism?

Follow us on socials too:
Tiktok:   / inside764podcast   
Instagram:   / inside764podcast

episodes.title: Episode 4: Why 764 Became So Dangerous — The O9A Connection Finally Explained
episodes.description:
Inside 764: Episode 4 explores the 764 cult and the extremist ideology driving it, revealing how the Order of Nine Angles inspired the violent chaos mindset that shaped the group, influenced its leaders, and radicalised children online. 

Through interviews and newly uncovered evidence, this episode shows how accelerationism, online desensitisation, and extremist beliefs combined to create one of the most disturbing youth-led networks in modern history. Inside 764 continues to investigate how the group formed, spread across the internet, and turned teenagers into perpetrators of violence, abuse, and manipulation. 

If you have information connected to 764 or have been affected, please reach out to contact@inside764.com

Timestamps:
00:00 – Warning 
01:23 – What connects 764 & O9A (Order of Nine Angles)
07:37 – The birth of satanism how we know it today
15:51 – The ideological father of O9A
22:58 – Please help us spread awareness of 764

episodes.title: Ep 3: Deadly Influence: From Self-Harm to Murder in Teen Cults
episodes.description:
Episode 3 of Inside 764 reveals how the teen-led 764 cult escalated from online coercion and self-harm challenges to real-world violence and murder. We hear from a parent who lost a daughter at the hands of the cult, as well as the story of the first 764 affiliated murder. 


764 spirals from Discord chatrooms to splinter groups like No Lives Matter: a group where membership requires real-world violence. Experts, journalists, and survivors expose how 764’s deadly influence inspired copycat attacks, terrorist plots, and extreme acts of violence across the US, UK, Sweden, Brazil, and beyond. This episode shows how vulnerable teens are manipulated into committing horrific acts for acceptance and notoriety.


Subscribe and follow Inside 764 to uncover the shocking truth about teen radicalisation, online predators, and the deadly influence of digital cults.

episodes.title: Ep 2: The Dark Net Rises: How Teens Spread Sextortion Worldwide
episodes.description:
Episode 2 exposes the dark rise of 764, the teen-led online cult that turned Discord, Roblox, and Minecraft into hunting grounds for coercion and abuse. Bradley Cadenhead’s network didn’t just groom teens — it pushed victims into self-harm, animal abuse, and real-world crimes, spreading fear and control across the internet.

We investigate the shocking connections to Kaleb Merritt, the CVLT network, and extremist group 09A, revealing how 764’s twisted ideology continues to manipulate young people. Survivors, journalists, and investigators pull back the curtain on the tactics that make this digital cult so dangerous.

Subscribe and follow Inside 764 to uncover the shocking truth about the online predators hiding behind the games your kids love.

episodes.title: Ep 1: Who is Brad764? America’s Youngest Cult Leader
episodes.description:
Inside 764 untangles the web of a teen-led online cult targeting children through Discord, Roblox, and Minecraft. 

In this first episode, a Discord user operating under the name of ‘Brad764’ is linked to a global sextortion ring. Survivors share their stories, and investigators reveal how a digital cult was built from the bedroom of a teenage boy.

Subscribe and follow Inside 764 for the full investigation into this shocking online cult.

episodes.title: Inside 764: The Most Dangerous Cult You've Never Heard Of
episodes.description:
A cult founded in a kid's bedroom in Texas soon became one of the biggest threats to domestic terror in the US. This is the story of 764.

An Alamo Pictures podcast series in conjunction with Soho Podcasts and WIRED Studios. 

New episodes every week starting December 1st. 

Watch on YouTube & listen anywhere you get your podcasts.
